${log.path}/log_info.log
%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%thread] %-5level %logger{50} - %msg%n UTF-8
${log.path}/info/log-info-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log
100MB
15
info ACCEPT DENY
${log.path}/log_error.log
%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%thread] %-5level %logger{50} - %msg%n UTF-8
${log.path}/error/log-error-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log
100MB
15
